dalserver.sla

Class SlapKeywordFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.KeywordFactory
      • dalserver.conf.XMLConfiguredKeywordFactory
        • dalserver.sla.SlapKeywordFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable

    public class SlapKeywordFactory
extends XMLConfiguredKeywordFactory
    SlapKeywordFactory implements a factory class for well-known SLAP keywords, including Groups, Params and Fields. The use of a factory class frees the client from having to know all the detailed metadata associated with each type of keyword. Keywords are indexed by both their ID and UTYPE tags. In general UTYPE is required to ensure uniqueness, but within a limited scope, the ID tag may be sufficient to uniquely identify a keyword without having to know the full UTYPE.

    A list of the major SLAP keywords including the defined ID and UTYPE keys is shown in this table.

      • SlapKeywordFactory

        public SlapKeywordFactory(RequestResponse response)
                   throws DalServerException,
                          KeywordConfig.FormatException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Create a new SLAP keyword factory and initialize an associated request response to process SLAP keywords. This is not required, but allows automated initialization of related context such as the keyword name space.
        Parameters:
        response - RequestResponse object to be linked to the SLAP keyword factory.
        Throws:
        DalServerException
        KeywordConfig.FormatException
        java.io.IOException
